description: Enterprise techniques used by PsExec, ATT&CK software S0029 v1.1
name: PsExec (S0029)

techniques.comment: [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029) can be used to download or upload a file over a network share.(Citation: PsExec Russinovich)

[PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029), a tool that has been used by adversaries, writes programs to the ADMIN$ network share to execute commands on remote systems.(Citation: PsExec Russinovich)

Microsoft Sysinternals [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029) is a popular administration tool that can be used to execute binaries on remote systems using a temporary Windows service.(Citation: Russinovich Sysinternals)
